column1: #mapping_set_title: MP to HPO mappings for Alzheimer disease related phenotypes

#mapping_set_description: "Symptoms for Alzheimer's disease were collected from the published literature and OMIM.org. Phenotype terms in MP and HPO corresponding to these phenotypes were identified and used to define the set of terms for these mappings. This work was primarily done as part of a summer research  project for Mouse Genome Informatics by Sarah Stofel (orcid:0000-0003-2307-1226)."
